src: Misschien denkt u na de film National Treasure dat er een schatkaart achter op de Onafhankelijkheidsverklaring staat. Dat berust echter op een misvatting. Er staat wel iets op de achterkant geschreven, maar het is geen schatkaart. Op de achterkant van de Amerikaanse Onafhankelijkheidsverklaring staan de woorden 'Originele Amerikaanse Onafhankelijkheidsverklaring, dd. 4 juli 1776'. De tekst staat ondersteboven onderaan het document. Hoewel niemand zeker weet wie het heeft geschreven, is het wel zeker dat het grote perkament (van 29¾ inch bij 24½ inch) vroeger is opgerold voor opslag. Het lijkt er dus op dat de aanduiding gewoon als een soort label is toegevoegd.
mt: You may think after the movie National Treasure that there is a treasure map behind the Declaration of Independence. However, this is a misconception. There is something written on the back, but it is not a treasure map. On the back of the American Declaration of Independence are the words "Original Declaration of Independence, July 4, 1776." The text is written upside down at the bottom of the document. Although no one knows for sure who wrote it, it is certain that the large parchment (29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage at some point. It appears that the marking was simply added as a kind of label.
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: In de beginjaren van de onafhankelijkheid van het land hielpen experts van de botanische tuinen van Singapore om het eiland in een tropische stadstuin om te toveren. In 1981 werd Vanda Miss Joaquim, een kruising van orchideeën, gekozen als nationale bloem.
mt: In the early years of the country's independence, experts from the Singapore Botanic Gardens helped transform the island into a tropical city garden. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, a hybrid orchid, was chosen as the national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: In de beginjaren van de onafhankelijkheid van het land hielpen experts van de botanische tuinen van Singapore om het eiland in een tropische stadstuin om te toveren. In 1981 werd Vanda Miss Joaquim, een kruising van orchideeën, gekozen als nationale bloem.

src: Hoewel het bouwen van stenen piramides doorging tot het einde van het Oude Rijk, blijven de piramides van Giza onovertroffen wat betreft grootte en technische uitmuntendheid van de constructie. De oude Egyptenaren van het nieuwe koninkrijk bewonderden het monument van hun voorgangers, dat toen al meer dan duizend jaar oud was.
mt: Although the building of stone pyramids continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza remain unmatched in size and technical excellence of construction. The ancient Egyptians of the New Kingdom admired the monument of their predecessors, which was then already over a thousand years old.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: Rond oktober trekken jaarlijks bijna 1,5 miljoen herbivoren vanuit de noordelijke heuvels naar de zuidelijke vlakke gebieden omdat het daar regent. Hierbij steken ze de Mara-rivier over. En na de regenval van april weer noordwaarts via het westen, wederom door de rivier de Mara. De regio Serengeti omvat het Serengeti nationaal park, het natuurgebied Ngorongoro, het wildreservaat Maswa in Tanzania en het nationale natuurreservaat Masai Mara in Kenia.
mt: 1.5 million herbivores migrate annually from the northern hills to the southern plains because it rains there. They cross the Mara River. And after the April rains northward again via the west, again through the Mara River. The Serengeti region includes the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro nature reserve, the Maswa wildlife reserve in Tanzania and the Masai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: Rond oktober trekken jaarlijks bijna 1,5 miljoen herbivoren vanuit de noordelijke heuvels naar de zuidelijke vlakke gebieden omdat het daar regent. Hierbij steken ze de Mara-rivier over. En na de regenval van april weer noordwaarts via het westen, wederom door de rivier de Mara. De regio Serengeti omvat het Serengeti nationaal park, het natuurgebied Ngorongoro, het wildreservaat Maswa in Tanzania en het nationale natuurreservaat Masai Mara in Kenia.
mt: 1.5 million herbivores migrate annually from the northern hills to the southern plains because it rains there. They cross the Mara River. And after the April rains northward again via the west, again through the Mara River. The Serengeti region includes the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro nature reserve, the Maswa wildlife reserve in Tanzania and the Masai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: Toen de slag om Frankrijk voorbij was, maakte Duitsland zich klaar voor de invasie van het eiland Brittannië. Duitsland gaf de aanval de codenaam 'Operatie Seelöwe'. Het grootste deel van de zware wapens en voorraden van het Britse leger was tijdens de evacuatie vanuit Duinkerken verloren gegaan, waardoor het leger ernstig was verzwakt. De Royal Navy was echter nog steeds sterker dan de Duitse Marine ('Kriegsmarine'). Ze hadden iedere invasievloot die het Engelse kanaal zou oversteken kunnen vernietigen. Er waren echter maar weinig koninklijke marineschepen die nabij logische aanvalsroutes lagen, omdat de admiralen bang waren dat ze tot zinken gebracht zouden worden bij een Duitse luchtaanval.
mt: After the battle for France was over, Germany prepared for the invasion of the island of Britain. Germany gave the attack the codename 'Operation Sealion'. Most of the heavy weapons and supplies of the British army had been lost during the evacuation from Dunkirk, leaving the army seriously weakened. The Royal Navy was still stronger than the German Navy ('Kriegsmarine'). They could have destroyed any invasion fleet that would have crossed the English Channel. However, there were few royal navy ships near likely attack routes, because the admirals were afraid that they would be sunk by a German air attack.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: Eerst gaan we het hebben over de plannen van Italië, het kleintje tegenover 'grote broers' Duitsland en Japan. Zowel zijn leger als de vloot waren zwakker, ondanks dat er vlak voor de oorlog vier nieuwe schepen waren vervaardigd. De belangrijkste doelen van Italië waren Afrikaanse landen. Voor het veroveren van deze landen hadden ze een strategische opening voor hun troepen nodig, zodat deze troepen over de Middellandse Zee Afrika konden binnendringen. Daarvoor moesten ze van de Britse bases en schepen in Egypte af. Naast deze acties mochten de slagschepen van Italië niks anders doen. En dan hebben we Japan. Net zoals Groot-Brittannië was Japan een eilandstaat.
mt: 1st we'll talk about the plans of Italy, the little one against the "big brothers" Germany and Japan. Both their army and their navy were weaker, despite the fact that four new ships were built just before the war. The main targets of Italy were African countries. To conquer these countries they needed a strategic opening for their troops, so that these troops could enter Africa through the Mediterranean Sea. For this they had to take the British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides these actions the Italian battleships could do nothing else. And then we have Japan. Just like Great Britain, Japan was an island state.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: Dankzij de D-Day-landingen en de gevechten die daarop volgden werd het noorden van Frankrijk bevrijd. Het zuiden bleef echter bezet. Het werd geregeerd door Vichy-Frankrijk. Dit waren Fransen die zich in 1940 aan de kant van de Duitsers schaarde en dus met de vijand heulde in plaats van tegen ze vechten. Op 15 augustus 1940 vielen de geallieerden met Operatie Dragoon Zuid-Frankrijk binnen. De Amerikanen en de Vrije Fransen hadden Zuid-Frankrijk binnen slechts twee weken bevrijd. Daarna gingen ze op weg naar Duitsland.
mt: 15 August 1944 was the day the Allies invaded southern France. The operation was called Operation Dragoon. The Americans and the Free French had liberated southern France in only two weeks. Then they set off for Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Onderzeeërs zijn schepen die speciaal ontworpen zijn om voor langere tijd onder water te varen. Onderzeeboten werden in de Eerste en Tweede Wereldoorlog ingezet. Destijds waren ze erg langzaam en hadden hun wapens een beperkt bereik. In de eerste fase van de oorlog bewogen ze zich vaak drijvend voort, maar toen de radarontwikkelingen tot een grotere nauwkeurigheid leidden, moesten de onderzeeboten duiken om ongezien te blijven. Duitse onderzeeboten werden U-boten genoemd. De Duitsers waren zeer bedreven in de besturing en navigatie van hun onderzeeboten. Duitsers kenden grote successen met onderzeeërs en daarom worden ze na de oorlog niet vertrouwd met te veel onderzeeërs.
mt: Submarines are ships designed to stay underwater for long periods of time. Submarines were used in the First and Second World Wars. At the time they were very slow and their weapons had a limited range. In the first phase of the war they often moved by floating, but when radar developments led to greater accuracy, submarines had to dive to remain unseen. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were very skilled in the control and navigation of their submarines. Germans had great success with submarines and therefore are not trusted with too many submarines after the war.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: De Poolse verdedigingstroepen hielden het slechts tot 17 september 1939 vol, waarna ze zich moesten terugtrekken en herorganiseren langs het bruggenhoofd in Roemenië. Deze plannen waren echter in één nacht achterhaald, toen er 800.000 soldaten uit het Rode Leger van de Sovjet Unie binnenvielen en de Letse en Oekraïense fronten vormden, nadat ze de oostelijke delen van Polen bezetten. Dit was in strijd met de Vrede Van Riga, het Sovjet-Poolse niet-aanvalsverdrag en andere internationale vredesverdragen die zowel bilateraal en multilateraal waren.
mt: The Polish defenders held out only until 17 September 1939, when they had to retreat and reorganize along the bridgehead in Romania. These plans were however rendered obsolete in one night, when 800,000 soldiers from the Red Army of the Soviet Union invaded and formed the Latvian and Ukrainian fronts, after they had occupied the eastern parts of Poland. This was in violation of the Peace of Riga, the Soviet-Polish non-aggression treaty and other international peace treaties that were both bilateral and multilateral.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Met de Italianen in Noord-Afrika ging het al vanaf het begin niet goed. Nadat Italië op 10 juni 1940 de oorlog had verklaard, werd Fort Capuzzo in Libië binnen een week in beslag genomen door de Britse 11e Huzaren. Tijdens een hinderlaag ten oosten van Bardia namen de Britten Generaal Lastucci, de Italiaanse tiende ingenieur van het leger, gevangen. Op 28 juni is maarschalk Italo Balbo, de Libische gouverneur-generaal van Libië en beoogde opvolger van Mussolini, in Tobroek door vriendschappelijk vuur omgekomen toen ze daar landden.
mt: With the Italians in North Africa it went from the start not well. After Italy declared war on 10 June 1940, Fort Capuzzo in Libya was taken within a week by the British 11th Hussars. During an ambush east of Bardia, the British took General Lastucci, the Italian tenth engineer of the army, prisoner. On 28 June, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Libyan governor-general of Libya and intended successor of Mussolini, was killed in Tobruk by friendly fire when they landed there.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Het Tibetaanse boeddhisme heeft zijn basis in de leer van Boeddha. Deze vorm van boeddhisme is echter uitgebreid met het mahayana-pad van de liefde en met een groot aantal technieken uit de Indiase yoga. Het Tibetaanse boeddhisme bestaat uit een relatief eenvoudige kern van kundalini-yoga, mediteren en een navolging van universele liefde. Door yoga-houdingen, oefeningen voor de ademhaling, mantra's en gevisualiseerde beelden, wordt de energie van Kundalini-yoga (verlichtingsenergie) opgewekt. De kern van Tibetaanse meditatie is yoga met een godheid als focus. Met behulp van de visualisatie van verschillende godheden worden energiekanalen opgeschoond, chakra's geactiveerd en wordt het bewustzijn in een verlichte staat gebracht.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha. However, this form of Buddhism has been expanded with the Mahayana path of love and with a large number of techniques from Indian yoga. Tibetan Buddhism consists of a relatively simple core of Kundalini yoga, meditation and following universal love. By yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualized images, the Kundalini yoga energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened. The core of Tibetan meditation is yoga with a deity as focus. With the help of the visualization of different deities, energy channels are cleaned, chakras are activated and the consciousness is brought into an enlightened state.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: De plaatselijke starttijd van het programma was 20.30 uur (15.00 UTC). Bekende zangers uit het hele land zongen bhajans of religieuze liederen aan de voeten van Shri Shyam. De avond ving aan met de zanger Sanju Sharma, gevolgd door Jai Shankar Choudhary. Lakka Singh heeft ook de Chhappan bhog bhajan gepresenteerd. De zanger Raju Khandelwal hielp hem hierbij. Daarna zong Lakkha Singh de bhajans. Aan Baba Shyam werden 108 borden met Chhappan Bhog geserveerd (in het hindoeïsme zijn dit 56 verschillende eetbare artikelen, zoals, snoepjes, fruit, noten, gerechten, etc. die aan het heilige figuur worden aangeboden). Lakkha Singh heeft ook de Chhappan bhog bhajan gepresenteerd. De zanger Raju Khandelwal hielp hem hierbij.
mt: 20:30 local time (15:00 UTC) was the local start time of the program. Famous singers from all over the country sang bhajans or religious songs at the feet of Shri Shyam. The evening began with the singer Sanju Sharma, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. Lakka Singh has also presented the Chhappan bhog bhajan. The singer Raju Khandelwal helped him here. Then Lakka Singh sang the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog were served to Baba Shyam (in Hinduism, these are 56 different edible items, such as sweets, fruit, nuts, dishes, etc. that are offered to the holy figure). Lakka Singh has also presented the Chhappan bhog bhajan. The singer Raju Khandelwal helped him here.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: De festiviteiten werden afgetrapt met een bijzondere show van de wereldwijd bekende groep Cirque du Soleil. Daarna volgde Staats-Symfonieorkest van Istanbul, een Janitsarenband en de zangers Fatih Erkoç en Müslüm Gürses. Toen kwamen de Whirling Dervishes het podium op. De Turkse diva Sezen Aksu deelde het podium met de Italiaanse tenor Alessandro Safina en de Grieke zanger Haris Alexiou. Ter afsluiting werd de show 'Troy' uitgevoerd door de Turkse dansgroep Fire of Anatolia.
mt: The festivities were kicked off with a special show by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. Then came the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Next came the Whirling Dervishes. The Turkish diva Sezen Aksu shared the stage with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The show ended with the performance of "Troy" by the Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: Passagiers kregen water tijdens het wachten in een hitte van 90 graden Fahrenheit. Brandweerkapitein Scott Kouns verklaarde dat 'het een warme dag in Santa Clara was met temperaturen boven de 90 graden. Het is nooit comfortabel om vast te zitten in een achtbaan, ongeacht hoelang het duurt, en het duurde bijna een uur om de eerste persoon uit de attractie te halen.'
mt: Passengers were given water while waiting in a heat of 90 degrees Fahrenheit. Fire Captain Scott Kouns stated that 'it was a hot day in Santa Clara with temperatures over 90 degrees. It's never comfortable to be stuck in a roller coaster, regardless of how long it takes, and it took almost an hour to get the first person out of the ride.'
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Volgens het laatste bulletin wees de stand van de zeespiegel op een vloedgolf. Er is enige duidelijke tsunami-activiteit geregistreerd nabij Pago Pago en Niue. Er is in Tonga geen grote schade of ernstig letsel doorgegeven, hoewel de stroom voor enige tijd uitviel. Hierdoor leken de Tongaanse autoriteiten de tsunami-waarschuwing van het PTWC niet te kunnen ontvangen. De waarschuwingen werden ingetrokken, maar toch waren veertien scholen in Hawaï aan of nabij kustlijnen woensdag de hele dag gesloten.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, the sea level was rising, indicating a tsunami. There was some clear tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. There was no major damage or serious injury reported in Tonga, although the power was out for a time. This caused the Tongan authorities to miss the tsunami warning from the PTWC. The warnings were retracted, but nevertheless, fourteen schools in Hawaii near or on the coast were closed all day Wednesday.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, bijrijder van het A1GP-team van Nieuw-Zeeland, ging vandaag de geschiedenis boeken in door op legale manier de snelst tijd neer te zetten op de 48-jaar oude Auckland Harbour Bridge in Nieuw-Zeeland. Het lukte dhr. Reid om met Black Beauty, de A1GP-auto van Nieuw-Zeeland, maar liefst 7 keer met een snelheid van meer dan 160 km/u over de brug te rijden. De Nieuw-Zeelandse politie kon nauwelijks met hun lasergun vaststellen hoe snel de heer Reid ging, vanwege de lage wegligging van Black Beauty. De enige keer dat de politie het voor elkaar kreeg om de snelheid van de heer Reid vast te stellen, was toen hij het tempo terugbracht tot 160 km/u.
mt: Jonny Reid, co-driver of the A1GP team of New Zealand, made history today by legally setting the fastest time ever on the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand. Mr. Reid managed to drive Black Beauty, the A1GP car of New Zealand, a total of 7 times at a speed of more than 160 km/h. The New Zealand police could hardly determine how fast Mr. Reid was going with their laser gun, due to the low ride height of Black Beauty. The only time the police managed to determine the speed of Mr. Reid was when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Maandag om 10:08 uur werd het westen van Montana opgeschrikt door een middelzware aardbeving. Er kwamen bij de United States Geological Survey (USGS) en het National Earthquake Information Centrum geen schademeldingen binnen. De aardbeving deed zich zo'n 20 km (15 mijl) ten noord-noordoosten van Dillon voor, en zo'n 65 km (40 mijl) ten zuiden van Butte.
mt: 10:08 am Monday morning, the western part of Montana was shaken by a moderate earthquake. There were no reports of damage from the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake occurred about 20 km (15 miles) northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Bij een oproer staken mensen de Abu Ghraib-gevangenis in Irak in brand. De gevangenis werd berucht toen misbruik van gevangenen aan het licht kwam, nadat de Amerikaanse strijdkrachten het hadden overgenomen.
mt: During a riot, people set fire to the Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq. The prison was notorious when abuse of prisoners came to light after the American military took over.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Het bandoptreden in het War Memorial Stadium in Maui, met naar verwachting 9000 toeschouwers, werd afgezegd, met verontschuldigingen van de band naar de fans. Het management van de band, HK Management Inc. gaf geen expliciete reden op waarom 20 september gecanceld werd, maar een dag later zeiden ze dat het vanwege logistieke redenen was.
mt: 20 September's concert in the War Memorial Stadium in Maui, with an expected 9,000 attendees, was cancelled, with apologies from the band to the fans. The band's management, HK Management Inc. did not give an explicit reason for the cancellation, but a day later they said it was due to logistical reasons.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: De wijdverspreide plunderingen gingen naar verluidt 's nachts door, omdat er in de straten van Bishkek geen wetshandhavers aanwezig waren. Bishkek werd door één persoon beschreven als een 'anarchistische staat', waar bendes op straat rondliepen en winkels met consumptiegoederen geplunderd werden. In Bishkek werd de schuld van de onrust door meerdere mensen bij demonstranten uit het zuiden gelegd.
mt: The widespread looting reportedly went on overnight, as there were no law enforcement officers on the streets of Bishkek. Bishkek was described by one person as an "anarchist state", where gangs roamed the streets and looted shops selling consumer goods. In Bishkek, the blame for the unrest was laid by several people on demonstrators from the south.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Eerder merkte Jamie Siminoff, de CEO van Ring, op dat het bedrijf is opgericht toen zijn deurbel van de winkel niet hoorbaar was in zijn garage. Hij zei dat hij daarop een wifi-deurbel maakte. Siminoff zei dat de verkoop steeg nadat hij in 2013 in een aflevering van Shark Tank verscheen, waarbij het panel van het programma de start-up niet wilde financieren. Eind 2017 was Siminoff te zien op teleshoppingkanaal QVC. Ring trof ook een schikking in een rechtszaak met de ADT Corporation. Dat is een concurrerend beveiligingsbedrijf.
mt: Earlier, Jamie Siminoff, the CEO of Ring, noted that the company was founded when his doorbell was inaudible in his garage. He said that he then made a WiFi doorbell. Siminoff said that sales increased after he appeared on Shark Tank in 2013, where the panel of the show did not want to finance the startup. At the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on teleshopping channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with the ADT Corporation. That is a competing security company.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: De PBS-show heeft meer dan twintig Emmy's gewonnen en ze zijn korter op de buis dan Mister Rogers' Neighborhood en Sesamstraat. Elke aflevering van het programma richtte zich op een thema uit een bepaald boek, waarna dat thema verder werd verkend door middel van meerdere verhalen. Elke show bevatte ook tips voor boeken die kinderen in hun bibliotheek konden vinden. John Grant van WNED Buffalo (het station van Reading Rainbow), zei: 'Reading Rainbow liet kinderen zien waarom ze moeten lezen... bracht hen de liefde voor lezen bij - [de show] spoorde kinderen aan om een boek te pakken en te gaan lezen.' Sommige mensen, zoals John Grant, geloven dat de serie aan haar eind is gekomen vanwege de financiële crisis en een verschuiving in de filosofie van educatieve televisieprogrammering.
mt: The PBS show has won more than twenty Emmys and is shorter on the air than Mister Rogers' Neighborhood and Sesame Street. Each episode of the program focused on a theme from a particular book, which was then further explored through multiple stories. Each show also included tips for books that children could find in their libraries. John Grant of WNED Buffalo (the station of Reading Rainbow), said: 'Reading Rainbow showed children why they should read... brought them the love of reading - [the show] encouraged children to pick up a book and go read.' Some people, such as John Grant, believe the series has ended because of the financial crisis and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amsterdamse ambtenaren en medewerkers van het Anne Frank Huis stellen dat de boom een schimmel heeft en een gevaar voor de volksgezondheid vormt, omdat de boom volgens hen om zou kunnen vallen. De boom zou dinsdag worden omgehakt, maar een noodbevel van de rechtbank hield dit tegen.
mt: Amsterdam officials and employees of the Anne Frank House say the tree has a fungus and is a health hazard, as they say it could fall. The tree was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but a court injunction stopped this.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Animal Liberation en de Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) maken zich opnieuw sterk om het ophangen van CCTV-camera's in alle Australische slachthuizen te verplichten. David O'Shannessy is hoofdinspecteur van RSPCA New South Wales en hij zei tegen het ABC dat toezicht op en controles van slachthuizen in Australië een normale procedure moet zijn. 'De bewakingscamera's maken de mensen die met dieren werken duidelijk dat het welzijn van de dieren topprioriteit heeft.'
mt: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. David O'Shannessy is the RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector and he told the ABC that surveillance and inspection of abattoirs in Australia should be a normal procedure. "The CCTV cameras make it clear to the people working with animals that animal welfare is top priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Vandaag bereikte Red Lake het nieuws dat er nog een leerling is gearresteerd in verband met de schietpartijen op 21 maart in de school. Op deze dag vond ook de begrafenis van Jeff Weise en drie van zijn negen slachtoffers plaats. De autoriteiten hebben geen officiële verklaring afgelegd naast de bevestiging van de arrestatie van vandaag. Maar een bron die het onderzoek kent, heeft de Minneapolis Star-Tribune verteld dat het om Louis Jourdain gaat, de 16-jarige zoon van Red Lake Tribal-voorzitter Floyd Jourdain. Op dit moment is nog niet bekend wat de aanklachten zijn of waarom de jongen door de autoriteiten is opgepakt, maar de jeugdprocedure is van start gegaan bij de federale rechtbank.
mt: Today Red Lake made the news that another student was arrested in connection with the shootings on March 21 in the school.  On this day the funeral of Jeff Weise and three of his nine victims also took place.  Authorities have not issued an official statement other than confirming the arrest of today.  But a source familiar with the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.  It is not yet known what the charges are or why the young man was picked up by authorities, but the juvenile procedure has begun in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Volgens de organisatoren van het protest waren er circa 100.000 mensen aanwezig in Duitse steden zoals Berlijn, Keulen, Hamburg en Hannover. In Berlijn waren volgens de politie naar schatting 6500 demonstranten. Ook in Parijs, in de Bulgaarse hoofdstad Sofia, de Litouwse hoofdstad Vilnius, de Maltese hoofdstad Valetta, de Estse hoofdstad Tallinn en de Schotse steden Edinburgh en Glasgow waren protesten. In London vond bij meerdere kantoren van auteursrechthebbenden een protest van zo'n 200 mensen plaats. Toen Polen vorige maand de ACTA ondertekende, braken er grote protesten uit, waardoor de Poolse regering heeft besloten de overeenkomst voorlopig niet te ratificeren. Letland en Slowakije hebben beide het proces uitgesteld om zich bij ACTA te voegen.
mt: 100,000 people were reported to have attended protests in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. In Berlin, 6,500 protesters were reported by police. Protests also took place in Paris, in the Bulgarian capital Sofia, the Lithuanian capital Vilnius, the Maltese capital Valetta, the Estonian capital Tallinn and the Scottish cities of Edinburgh and Glasgow. In London, about 200 people protested outside several copyright holders' offices. When Poland signed ACTA last month, large protests broke out, forcing the Polish government to decide to temporarily not ratify the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Er zijn ongeveer 60 gevallen gerapporteerd van defecte iPods die oververhit raken. In totaal leidde dit tot zes branden en vier mensen met lichte brandwonden. Het Japanse ministerie van Economie, Handel en Industrie (METI) liet weten dat het bekend was met de 27 ongelukken die verband hielden met de apparaten. Vorige week kondigde METI aan dat Apple 34 aanvullende incidenten met oververhitting had gemeld die het bedrijf 'niet ernstig' noemde. 'Erg betreurenswaardig', luidde de reactie van het ministerie over het feit dat Apple het rapport heeft uitgesteld.
mt: 60 cases of defective iPods overheating have been reported. Six fires and four people with minor burns resulted. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it was aware of the 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had reported 34 additional overheating incidents that the company deemed "not serious." "Very regrettable," METI said of Apple's delay in reporting the incidents.
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Apple CEO Steve Jobs liep het podium op en haalde de iPhone uit zijn broekzak om het apparaat te onthullen. Tijdens zijn twee uur durende speech zei hij dat 'Apple vandaag de telefoon opnieuw gaat uitvinden en we vandaag geschiedenis gaan schrijven'.
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs walked on stage and pulled an iPhone from his pocket to unveil the device. During his two-hour speech, he said, "Apple is reinventing the phone today and we're going to write the history of the phone."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, senator en de vrouw van de Argentijnse president, heeft gisteravond in La Plata, een stad op 50 km (31 mijl) afstand van Buenos Aires, aangekondigd zich verkiesbaar te willen stellen als president. Mevrouw Kirchner kondigde haar intentie om voor het presidentschap te gaan aan in het Argentijnse Theater, waar ze in 2005 haar campagne voor de senaat startte als lid van de deelstaatafvaardiging van Buenos Aires.
mt: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, senator and wife of the Argentine president, announced last night in La Plata, a city 50 km (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, that she intends to run for president. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president in the Argentine Theater, where she started her campaign for the Senate in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires provincial delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Omdat de video niet op de website van Big Brother is opgeslagen, stelde ACMA bovendien dat Big Brother geen inbreuk heeft gemaakt op online content censuurwetten, ondanks het feit dat de video werd gestreamd op het internet. De Radio- en televisiewet reguleert de inhoud op het internet, maar om als internetinhoud te worden beschouwd, moet de inhoud fysiek op een server zijn opgeslagen.
mt: Because the video was not stored on the Big Brother website, ACMA also found that Big Brother did not breach online content censorship laws, despite the video being streamed online. The Radio and Television Act regulates content on the internet, but for content to be considered internet content, it must be physically stored on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Peter Costello, de Australische minister van Financiën en de man die hoogstwaarschijnlijk premier John Howard zal opvolgen als liberale partijleider, is een groot voorstander van kernenergie in Australië. Meneer Costello zei dat Australië moet inzetten op het gebruik van kernenergie zodra dit economisch haalbaar is. 'Zodra het beschikbaar is voor de verkoop, moeten we het hebben. Dat wil zeggen dat er geen principieel bezwaar is tegen kernenergie,' aldus de heer Costello.
mt: Peter Costello, Australia's Treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, is a strong advocate of nuclear power in Australia. Mr Costello said Australia should pursue nuclear power as soon as it is economically viable. "As soon as it's available for sale, we should have it. That is to say there is no principled objection to nuclear power," Mr Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Er worden elke dag maar achttien medailles uitgereikt, dus veel landen grepen naast het podium. Onder hen bevinden zich Nederland, waar Anna Jochemsen gisteren negende werd in de staande klasse voor vrouwen in de Super-G, en Finland, waar Katja Saarinen in hetzelfde evenement tiende werd. De Australische Mitchell Gourley eindigde elfde van de mannen in de staande Super-G. Zijn Tsjechische tegenstander Oldrich Jelinek werd zestiende in de zittende Super-G. Arly Velasquez van Mexico eindigde op de vijftiende plaats bij de mannen in de Super-G (zitski). De Nieuw-Zeelandse Adam Hall eindigde op de negende plaats in de Super-G (staand). De blinde skiër Maciej Krezel van het Poolse mannenteam en zijn gids Anna Ogarzynska werden dertiende op de Super G. De Zuid-Koreaanse Jong Seork Park werd vierentwintigste in de zittende Super-G voor mannen.
mt: 18 medals are awarded each day, so many countries missed the podium. Among them are the Netherlands, where Anna Jochemsen finished ninth in the standing women's Super-G, and Finland, where Katja Saarinen finished tenth in the same event. The Australian Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. His Czech counterpart Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the seated Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's Super-G (sitting). The New Zealand Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's Super-G (standing). The blind skier Maciej Krezel of the Polish men's team and his guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super G. The South Korean Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the seated Super-G for men.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Het proces werd in de Crown Court van Birmingham gehouden en werd op 3 augustus afgerond. De ter plekke gearresteerde nieuwslezer verklaarde dat hij het slachtoffer niet had aangevallen en dat hij zich met de paal beschermde tegen meer dan dertig mensen die hem met flessen bekogelden. Blake werd ook veroordeeld voor poging tot belemmering van de rechtstaat. Het was 'bijna niet te vermijden', zei de rechter tegen Blake, dat hij de gevangenis in zou gaan.
mt: The trial was held in the Crown Court of Birmingham and concluded on August 3. The on-site arrested newsreader declared that he did not attack the victim and that he used the pole to protect himself from more than thirty people who pelted him with bottles. Blake was also convicted of attempting to obstruct the administration of justice. It was "almost inevitable", the judge told Blake, that he would go to prison.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Op Bali staan ook andere onderwerpen op de agenda, zoals de bescherming van resterende bossen in de wereld, alsmede het delen van technologieën om ontwikkelingslanden te helpen om te groeien op een minder vervuilende manier. De V.N. hoopt ook een fonds op te richten om landen te helpen die te maken hebben met de opwarming van de aarde, om zo met de gevolgen ervan om te gaan. Overstromingsbestendige huizen, efficiënter waterbeheer en diversificatie van gewassen zouden investeringen kunnen zijn waar het geld voor gebruikt kan worden.
mt: Other issues on the agenda in Bali include the protection of remaining forests worldwide, as well as sharing of technologies to help developing countries grow in a less polluting way. The UN also hopes to set up a fund to help countries dealing with global warming to cope with its effects. Flood-resistant homes, more efficient water management and crop diversification could be investments the money could be used for.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Nigeria heeft eerder aangekondigd dat het zich de week voor de conferentie bij de AfCFTA wil voegen. Albert Muchanga, de minister van Handel en Industrie van de Afrikaanse Unie, kondigde aan dat Benin zich zou aansluiten. De commissaris zei: 'Er is nog niets afgesproken over oorsprongsregels en tarieven, maar het plan dat er ligt is voldoende om op 1 juli 2020 de handel te starten.'
mt: Nigeria earlier announced that it would join the AfCFTA the week before the conference. Albert Muchanga, the Minister of Trade and Industry of the African Union, announced that Benin would join. The commissioner said, "There is nothing agreed on about origin rules and tariffs, but the plan that is there is enough to start trade on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Nigeria heeft eerder aangekondigd dat het zich de week voor de conferentie bij de AfCFTA wil voegen. Albert Muchanga, de minister van Handel en Industrie van de Afrikaanse Unie, kondigde aan dat Benin zich zou aansluiten. De commissaris zei: 'Er is nog niets afgesproken over oorsprongsregels en tarieven, maar het plan dat er ligt is voldoende om op 1 juli 2020 de handel te starten.'
mt: Nigeria earlier announced that it would join the AfCFTA the week before the conference. Albert Muchanga, the Minister of Trade and Industry of the African Union, announced that Benin would join. The commissioner said, "There is nothing agreed on about origin rules and tariffs, but the plan that is there is enough to start trade on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Ze werd tijdens haar verblijf in Atlanta door de critici toegejuicht vanwege haar innovatieve stedelijk onderwijs. Ze werd benoemd tot de nationale hoofdopzichter van 2009. Tegen de tijd dat de prijs werd uitgereikt, zagen scholen in Atlanta veel verbetering in de cijfers. Niet veel later werden problemen met de resultaten aangekaart in een rapport van The Atlanta Journal-Constitution. Het verslag liet zien dat de testresultaten onwaarschijnlijk snel verbeterd waren, en naar verluidt merkte de school de problemen intern op, maar werd er niets met deze bevindingen gedaan. Het daaropvolgende bewijs gaf aan dat er met de testpapieren was geknoeid, waarna Hall, samen met 34 andere onderwijsambtenaren, werd aangeklaagd in 2013.
mt: She was cheered by critics during her stay in Atlanta for her innovative urban education. She was named the national superintendent of the year in 2009. By the time the award was presented, schools in Atlanta had seen much improvement in test scores. Not long after, problems with the results were raised in a report by The Atlanta Journal-Constitution. The report showed that test scores had improbably improved quickly, and according to reports, the school had internally noted the problems, but did nothing with the findings. The subsequent evidence showed that the test papers had been tampered with, and Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Eén bom is ontploft buiten het kantoor waar de gouverneur-generaal werkt. Binnen een periode van twee uur kwamen er nog drie bommen tot ontploffing in de buurt van overheidsgebouwen. In sommige rapporten wordt het officiële dodental op acht geschat. Officiële rapporten bevestigen maximaal 30 gewonden, maar de definitieve aantallen zijn er nog niet.
mt: 1 bomb exploded outside the office where the governor-general works. In a period of two hours, three more bombs exploded in the vicinity of government buildings. In some reports, the official death toll is eight. Official reports confirm a maximum of 30 wounded, but the final numbers are not yet available.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: In januari 2017 stapte de 21-jarige Jesus van de Braziliaanse club Palmeiras over naar Manchester City voor een bedrag van £ 27 miljoen. Sindsdien heeft de Braziliaan 53 wedstrijden in alle competities voor de club gespeeld en scoorde 24 doelpunten.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus moved from Brazilian club Palmeiras to Manchester City in January 2017 for a fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 matches in all competitions for the club and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: In Mekka, de heilige stad van de islam, is vanochtend om ongeveer 10.00 uur lokale tijd een hostel ingestort. In het gebouw verbleven een aantal pelgrims die de heilige stad bezochten op de avond van de Hajj-pelgrimstocht. De meeste gasten van het hostel waren inwoners van de Verenigde Arabische Emiraten. Er zijn ten minste 15 mensen omgekomen en verwacht wordt dat dit aantal zal stijgen.
mt: In Mecca, the holy city of Islam, a hostel collapsed this morning at around 10:00 am local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who visited the holy city during the Hajj pilgrimage. Most of the hostel's guests were residents of the United Arab Emirates. At least 15 people are dead and it is expected that the number will rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: De satellieten, die beide meer dan 1.000 pond wogen en zich met ongeveer 17.500 mijl per uur voortbewogen, kwamen 491 mijl boven aarde in botsing. Wetenschappers zeggen dat door de botsing een enorme explosie is ontstaan. Ze proberen nog steeds te achterhalen hoe groot de botsing is geweest en hoe deze de aarde zal beïnvloeden. De United States Strategic Command van het Amerikaanse ministerie van Defensie traceert het puin. Op een openbare website wordt het resultaat van de plotanalyse geplaatst.
mt: The satellites, which both weighed more than 1,000 pounds and were traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above Earth. Scientists say the collision caused a massive explosion. They are still trying to determine how big the collision was and how it will affect Earth. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense is tracking the debris. The results of the plot analysis are posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten stond in 2008 op plaats 190 op de lijst van de 400 rijkste Amerikanen met een geschat vermogen van 2,3 miljard dollar. In 1950 haalde hij een diploma aan het College of Arts & Sciences aan de universiteit van Virginia en later doneerde hij er veel geld aan.
mt: Batten was ranked 190th on the Forbes 400 list of richest Americans in 2008 with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. In 1950 he graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences at the University of Virginia and later donated much money to it.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Arnold Schwarzenegger, de gouverneur van Californië, heeft een wetsvoorstel ondertekend waarmee het verboden wordt om gewelddadige videogames aan minderjarigen te verkopen of te verhuren. Onder deze wet moeten gewelddadige videogames die in de staat Californië worden verkocht, een '18'-sticker hebben. Verkoop aan een minderjarige wordt bestraft met een boete van $ 1000 per overtreding.
mt: Arnold Schwarzenegger, the governor of California, has signed a bill making it illegal to sell or rent violent videogames to minors. Under the bill, violent videogames sold in California must have an "18" sticker. Selling to a minor is punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Duvall is getrouwd met twee kinderen en maakte geen grote indruk op Miller, aan wie het verhaal verwant was. Op een verzoek om commentaar reageerde Millar: 'Mike praat veel tijdens de zitting ... Ik was me aan het voorbereiden, dus luisterde niet echt naar hem.'
mt: Duvall is married with two children and made little impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. On a request for comment, Miller responded, "Mike talks a lot in court... I was preparing myself, so I wasn't really listening to him."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Premier Stephen Harper is akkoord gegaan om de 'Clean Air Act' van de overheid naar een commissie voor alle partijen te sturen voor herziening, voorafgaand aan de tweede lezing, na de 25 minuten durende vergadering met NDP-leider Jack Layton bij PMO op dinsdag. Tijdens de vergadering met de Minister-president vroeg Layton om veranderingen in de milieuwet van de conservatieven, waarbij hij vroeg om het 'grondig en volledig herschrijven' van de milieuwet van de conservatieve partij. Sinds de federale regering de financiering heeft overgenomen van het Mersey ziekenhuis in Devonport, Tasmanië, hebben de overheid en enkele federale parlementsleden deze wet bekritiseerd als stunt tijdens de beginperiode van de federale verkiezingen die in november worden gehouden. Minister-president John Howard heeft echter verklaard met de wet slechts te willen voorkomen dat de voorzieningen van het ziekenhuis werden teruggeschaald door de Tasmaanse overheid, door 45 miljoen Australische dollars extra uit te trekken.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the "Clean Air Act" to a committee for all parties to review, prior to the second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at PMO on Tuesday. During the meeting with the prime minister, Layton asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental law, asking for the "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative Party's environmental law. Since the federal government took over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the government and some federal parliamentarians have criticized the law as a stunt during the early stages of the federal elections to be held in November. Prime Minister John Howard, however, said he only wanted to prevent the hospital's services from being scaled back by the Tasmanian government, by pulling out an extra 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: In urinemonsters van huisdieren die zijn gestorven na het eten van besmette dierenvoeding, werd zowel cyaanuurzuur als melamine aangetroffen. Onderzoekers van de universiteit stelden dat de twee verbindingen met elkaar reageren waardoor zich kristallen vormen die de nierfunctie kunnen blokkeren. Wetenschappers kwamen erachter dat er kristallen gevormd worden in kattenurine wanneer je hier melanine en cyanuurzuur aan toevoegt. De samenstelling van deze kristallen heeft gelijkenissen met die van de urine van de getroffen huisdieren, vergeleken met de infraroodspectroscopie (FTIR).
mt: In urine samples from household pets that died after eating contaminated pet food, both cyanuric acid and melamine were found. Researchers at the university found that the two compounds react with each other to form crystals that can block kidney function. Scientists discovered that crystals form in cat urine when you add melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals has similarities with those of the urine of affected household pets, compared to the infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: Xinhua heeft gemeld dat onderzoekers van de overheid woensdag twee 'zwarte dozen' met vluchtrecorders terug hebben gevonden. Ook medeworstelaars brachten hulde aan Luna. Tommy Dreamer zei, 'Luna was de eerste 'Queen of Extreme'. Mijn eerste manager. Luna is overleden op de nacht van twee manen. Net zo uniek als zij was. Een sterke vrouw.' Dustin 'Goldust' Runnels gaf aan dat 'Luna net zo raar was als ik... misschien nog wel raarder... ik hou van haar en ga haar missen... hopelijk is ze op een betere plek'.
mt: Xinhua reported that government researchers found two "black boxes" with flight recorders on Wednesday. Also, fellow wrestlers paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first 'Queen of Extreme.' My first manager. Luna died on the night of two moons. Just as unique as she was. A strong woman." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels said, "Luna was just as weird as I am... maybe even weirder... I love her and will miss her... hopefully she's in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Er bevonden zich drie mensen in het huis toen de auto het huis raakte, maar geen van hen raakte gewond. De bestuurder liep echter wel ernstige verwondingen aan het hoofd op. De weg waar het ongeluk plaatsvond werd tijdelijk gesloten terwijl de hulpdiensten probeerden de chauffeur uit de rode Audi TT te bevrijden. Aanvankelijk werd hij opgenomen in Great Yarmouth, in het James Paget Hospital. Hij werd vervolgens overgeplaatst naar het Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car hit the house, but none of them were injured. The driver however suffered serious head injuries. The road where the accident took place was temporarily closed while emergency services tried to free the driver from the red Audi TT. Initially he was taken to Great Yarmouth, in the James Paget Hospital. He was then transferred to the Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Het was prachtig weer toen de wedstrijd om 10.00 uur 's ochtends begon. Halverwege de ochtend viel er wat motregen, maar het klaarde snel weer op. Het was een perfecte dag voor Rugby Sevens. De favoriet van het toernooi, Zuid-Afrika, begon goed met een comfortabele winst van 26 - 00 tegen het als 5e geplaatste Zambia. Hoewel ze erg stroef speelden tegen hun zuiderzusjes, wist Zuid-Afrika zichzelf in het toernooi steeds meer te verbeteren. Ze vielen op door hun strakke verdediging, controle over de bal en uitmuntende samenwerking en waren duidelijk de belangrijkste tegenstander.
mt: It was a beautiful day when the tournament started at 10:00 am. Mid-morning there was a little drizzle, but it cleared up quickly. It was a perfect day for Rugby Sevens. The favorite of the tournament, South Africa, started well with a comfortable win of 26 - 00 against the 5th seeded Zambia. Although they played very stiff against their southern sisters, South Africa improved themselves in the tournament. They stood out by their tight defense, control of the ball and outstanding teamwork and were clearly the main opponent.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Het was prachtig weer toen de wedstrijd om 10.00 uur 's ochtends begon. Halverwege de ochtend viel er wat motregen, maar het klaarde snel weer op. Het was een perfecte dag voor Rugby Sevens. De favoriet van het toernooi, Zuid-Afrika, begon goed met een comfortabele winst van 26 - 00 tegen het als 5e geplaatste Zambia. Hoewel ze erg stroef speelden tegen hun zuiderzusjes, wist Zuid-Afrika zichzelf in het toernooi steeds meer te verbeteren. Ze vielen op door hun strakke verdediging, controle over de bal en uitmuntende samenwerking en waren duidelijk de belangrijkste tegenstander.
mt: It was a beautiful day when the tournament started at 10:00 am. Mid-morning there was a little drizzle, but it cleared up quickly. It was a perfect day for Rugby Sevens. The favorite of the tournament, South Africa, started well with a comfortable win of 26 - 00 against the 5th seeded Zambia. Although they played very stiff against their southern sisters, South Africa improved themselves in the tournament. They stood out by their tight defense, control of the ball and outstanding teamwork and were clearly the main opponent.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: In de afgelopen drie decennia heeft China, ondanks het feit dat het officieel nog steeds een communistische staat is, een markteconomie ontwikkeld. Zo voerde men onder leiding van Deng Xiaoping de eerste economische veranderingen door. Vanaf toen is de Chinese economie 90 keer in omvang toegenomen. Afgelopen jaar heeft China voor het eerst meer auto's geëxporteerd dan Duitsland en zelfs de VS, waarmee het de grootste markt in de branche was. De GDP van China kan binnen twee decennia groter zijn dan die van de Verenigde Staten.
mt: In the past three decades, China, despite still being officially a communist state, has developed a market economy. Under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping, the first economic reforms were implemented. Since then, the Chinese economy has grown 90-fold. Last year, China exported more cars than Germany and even the United States, making it the largest market in the industry. China's GDP could be larger than that of the United States within two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: 'We doen ons uiterste best de koolstofdioxide-uitstoot per eenheid van het BBP in 2020 met een aanzienlijke marge te verminderen in vergelijking met het niveau van 2005,' zei Hu. Hij heeft voor de bezuinigingen geen cijfers vastgesteld, omdat hij zegt dat deze zullen worden bepaald op basis van de economische productie van China. Hu spoorde ontwikkelingslanden aan 'de oude manier van eerst vervuilen en later opruimen te vermijden'. Hij voegde toe dat 'ze daarentegen niet gevraagd zouden moeten worden om verplichtingen aan te gaan die buiten hun ontwikkeling, niveau, verantwoordelijkheid en mogelijkheden liggen.'
mt: 'We are doing our best to reduce the carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP in 2020 by a significant margin compared to the 2005 level,' Hu said. He has not set the cuts, because he says they will be determined based on China's economic production. Hu urged developing countries to 'avoid the old way of first polluting and then cleaning up'. He added that 'they should not be asked to take on commitments that are beyond their level of development, responsibility and capabilities.'
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Volgens de medische liefdadigheidsinstelling Mangola, Artsen zonder Grenzen en de Wereldgezondheidsorganisatie is het de ergste geregistreerde uitbraak in het land. Richard Veerman, woordvoerder van Artsen zonder Grenzen, vertelt: 'Angola is op weg naar de ergste uitbraak ooit en de situatie in het land blijft erg slecht.'
mt: According to the medical charity Médecins Sans Frontières, the World Health Organization and the World Health Organization, it is the worst recorded outbreak in the country. Richard Veerman, spokesman for Médecins Sans Frontières, says: 'Angola is on its way to the worst outbreak ever and the situation in the country remains very bad.'
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Kier Starmer QC, directeur van het Openbaar Ministerie, heeft vanochtend verklaard dat hij zowel Pryce en Huhne wil vervolgen. Huhne heeft ontslag genomen. In het kabinet is parlementslid Ed Davey zijn vervanger, terwijl parlementslid Norman Lamb naar verwachting Daveys taken als minister van Handel overneemt. Naar verwachting worden Huhne en Pryce op 16 februari voorgeleid voor de Westminster Magistrates Court.
mt: Kier Starmer QC, director of public prosecutions, announced this morning that he will prosecute both Pryce and Huhne. Huhne has resigned. In the cabinet, Ed Davey has been appointed as his replacement, while Norman Lamb is expected to take over Davey's responsibilities as Trade Secretary. It is expected that Huhne and Pryce will be presented before the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: De Franse opera is een verhaal van Camille Saint-Saens en gaat over een artiest 'wiens leven bepaald wordt door de liefde voor drugs en Japan.' Daar ten gevolge van, roken de performers cannabis op het podium. Het theater zelf stimuleert het publiek om mee te doen.
mt: The French opera is a story by Camille Saint-Saens and is about an artist "whose life is determined by the love of drugs and Japan." As a result of this, the performers smoke cannabis on stage. The theater itself encourages the audience to participate.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."
