In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Ook vertelde Lodin dat ambtenaren hadden besloten de hertelling te stoppen om de Afghanen de kosten en het veiligheidsrisico van een nieuwe verkiezing te besparen. Diplomaten zeiden dat ze genoeg dubbelzinnigheid hadden gevonden in de Afghaanse grondwet, waardoor een tweede verkiezingsronde niet nodig was. Dit spreekt eerdere verslagen tegen dat het annuleren van de tweede verkiezingsronde ongrondwettelijk zou zijn.
mt: Lodin also said officials had decided to stop the recount to save Afghans the costs and security risks of a new election. Diplomats said they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to make a second election round unnecessary, contradicting earlier reports that the annulment of the second election round would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: Nadat Pakistan in 1947 onafhankelijk werd van de Britten, worden er 'politieke ambtenaren' aangesteld door de president van Pakistan om FATA te besturen, wat ze vrijwel geheel autonoom kunnen doen. Volgens artikel 247 van de grondwet van Pakistan dienen deze agenten de overheid en de rechterlijke macht te ondersteunen.
mt: After Pakistan gained independence from the British in 1947, political agents are appointed by the president of Pakistan to govern FATA, which they can almost entirely autonomously. According to article 247 of the constitution of Pakistan, these agents are to assist the government and the judiciary.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: De film met Ryan Gosling en Emma Stone in de hoofdrollen werd voor alle belangrijke categorieën genomineerd. Gosling en Stone werden respectievelijk genomineerd voor Beste acteur en Beste actrice. Onder de overige nominaties bevonden zich onder meer de categorieën beste film, regisseur, cinematografie, kostuumontwerp, filmmontage, originele muziek, productieontwerp, muziek, geluidseffecten en origineel scenario. De nummers Audition (The Fools Who Dream) en City of Stars uit de film werden genomineerd voor Beste originele nummer. Lionsgate haalde 26 nominaties binnen, een record voor een studio.
mt: La La Land  was nominated for all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress respectively. Other nominations included Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Original Song, and Original Screenplay. The film's songs "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars" were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate received 26 nominations, a record for a studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Daarnaast meldde de NHK dat de kerncentrale van Kashiwazaki Kariwa in de prefectuur Niigata zoals normaal werkte. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. rapporteert dat de aardbeving geen problemen heeft veroorzaakt en dat in de kernenergiecentrale van Shika reactoren 1 en 2 zijn stopgezet. Volgens meldingen zitten er 9400 huishouden in de regio zonder water en ongeveer 100 zonder stroom. Enkele wegen zijn aangetast, de spoorwegdienst is gestaakt in de getroffen gebieden en de prefectuur van het vliegveld Noto in Ishikawa blijft voor langere tijd gesloten.
mt: In addition, NHK reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported that the earthquake had not caused any problems and that reactors 1 and 2 at the Shika nuclear power plant had been shut down. According to reports, there are 9,400 households in the region without water and about 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, train service has been suspended in the affected areas, and the Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture will remain closed for a long time.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Volgens bronnen verwijst het document naar een geschillenregeling, iets wat de Palestijnen graag wilden op grond van de grenzen voor de oorlog in het Midden-Oosten in 1967. Andere onderwerpen die besproken waren zijn de toekomstige status van Jeruzalem, een stad die voor beide volken heilig is, en de problemen in de Jordaanvallei. Israël eist dat er na ondertekening van een overeenkomst tien jaar lang een permanente militaire aanwezigheid is in de vallei. De PA is echter slechts bereid tot een aanwezigheid van vijf jaar.
mt: According to sources, the document refers to a dispute resolution mechanism, something the Palestinians wanted on the basis of the pre-war borders in the Middle East in 1967. Other issues discussed were the future status of Jerusalem, a city that is holy to both peoples, and the problems in the Jordan Valley. Israel demands that there be a permanent military presence for ten years after signing an agreement in the valley. The PA is only willing to agree to a presence of five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: De in Hongkong geboren Ma studeerde aan de New York University en Harvard Law School en had ooit een Amerikaanse 'green card', een permanente verblijfsvergunning. Tijdens de verkiezingen liet Hsieh doorschemeren dat Ma gedurende een crisistijd het land zou kunnen ontvluchten. Volgens Hsieh was de fotogenieke Ma wel stijlvol, maar had ze niet zo bar veel inhoud. Hoewel deze beschuldigingen werden geuit, won Ma eenvoudig op een platform dat zich hard maakte voor nauwere banden met het Chinese vasteland.
mt: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American "green card," a permanent residency permit. During the election, Hsieh hinted that Ma could flee the country during a crisis. According to Hsieh, the photogenic Ma was stylish, but didn't have much substance. Although these accusations were made, Ma won easily on a platform that advocated closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Toen bleek dat veel families juridische hulp zochten om huisuitzettingen te voorkomen, werd op 20 maart een bijeenkomst gehouden in het East Bay Community Law Center voor de slachtoffers van de fraude met woningen. Toen de huurders deelden wat hen was overkomen, beseften de meeste families plotseling dat Carolyn Wilson van de OHA hun borg had gestolen en de stad was ontvlucht. De bewoners van Lockwood Gardens zijn bang dat er wellicht nog eens op zijn minst 40 gezinnen uit huis worden gezet, omdat men heeft vernomen dat de OHA-politie (Oakland Housing Authority) ook andere openbare woningen onderzoekt in Oakland die mogelijk betrokken zijn bij de huizenzwendel.
mt: When it became clear that many families were seeking legal help to prevent evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing fraud. When the tenants shared what had happened to them, most families suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits and the city had fled. The residents of Lockwood Gardens are afraid that at least another 40 families may be evicted from public housing in Oakland, because they have heard that the OHA police (Oakland Housing Authority) are also investigating other public housing in Oakland that may be involved in the housing scam.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Na deze race heeft Keselowski 2250 punten en staat daarmee nog steeds vooraan in het coureurkampioenschap. Op zeven punten achterstand staat Johnson op de tweede plaats met 2.243. Hamlin staat met twintig punten achterstand op de derde plaats. Hij staat overigens wel vijf punten voor op Bowyer. Kahne en Truex Jr. staan op de vijfde en zesde plaats met respectievelijk 2.220 en 2.207 punten. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth en Harvick sluiten de top-tien posities af voor het Drivers' Championship met nog vier races te gaan in het seizoen.
mt: After this race, Keselowski has 2250 points and is still leading the driver's championship. Johnson is second with 2243 points, 7 points behind. Hamlin is third with 20 points behind, but he is 5 points ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex Jr. are fifth and sixth with 2220 and 2207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick close the top-10 positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races to go in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Er wordt algemeen aangenomen dat dit de vijfde keer in de geschiedenis is dat mensen een chemische bevestiging hebben gekregen dat materiaal van mars op aarde terechtkomt. Van de ongeveer 24.000 bekende meteorieten die op aarde zijn gevallen, zijn er maar een stuk of 34 waarvan we weten dat ze van Mars komen. Vijftien van deze stenen maakte onderdeel uit van de meteorenregen van afgelopen juli. De rotsen zijn zeer zeldzaam op aarde en enkele zijn verkocht voor prijzen van tussen 11.000 en 22.500 Amerikaanse dollars per ons, ongeveer het tienvoudige van de goudprijs.
mt: It is generally believed that this is the fifth time in history that people have received a chemical confirmation that material from Mars has landed on Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites that have fallen on Earth, only about 34 are known to be from Mars. Fifteen of these stones were part of the meteor shower of last July. The rocks are very rare on Earth and some have been sold for prices between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce, about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher ging in 2006 met pensioen nadat hij zeven keer het Formule 1-kampioenschap had gewonnen, maar moest de gewonde Felipe Massa vervangen. De Braziliaan liep bij zijn ongeluk in de Grand Prix van Hongarije in 2009 zwaar hoofdletsel op. Massa doet zeker de rest van het seizoen van 2009 niet meer mee.
mt: 2006, Schumacher retired after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, but had to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered severe head injuries in his accident at the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009. Massa is certainly not going to finish the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: AOL wordt in de Verenigde Staten wijdverspreid gebruikt en daarom heeft het bedrijf de IM-markt in zijn eigen tempo kunnen bewegen. Deze overeenkomst kan het einde van deze vrijheid betekenen. Het gecombineerde aantal gebruikers van de diensten van Yahoo! en Microsoft kan wedijveren met het aantal klanten van AOL.
mt: AOL is widely used in the United States, and so the company has been able to move the IM market at its own pace. This agreement could mean the end of this freedom. The combined number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services can compete with the number of AOL customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Gistermorgen ontplofte een autobom bij het hoofdbureau van de politie in Gaziantep, Turkije. Hierbij kwamen twee politieagenten om het leven en raakten meer dan twintig andere personen gewond. Onder de gewonden zijn negentien politieagenten, zei de gouverneur. De politie verdenkt een vermeende Daesh-militair (ISIS) van de aanval.
mt: Yesterday morning, a car bomb exploded outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey. Two police officers were killed and more than twenty others were injured. Nineteen of the injured were police officers, the governor said. The police suspect a suspected Daesh militant (ISIS) of the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Voormalig gouverneur van Massachusetts Mitt Romney heeft dinsdag met meer dan 46 procent van de stemmen de verkiezingen voor presidentskandidaat van de Florida Republican Party gewonnen. Voormalig Amerikaans voorzitter van het Huis van Afgevaardigden Newt Gingrich werd tweede met 32 procent. Florida hanteert het principe 'winner takes all' en kende alle vijftig afgevaardigden toe aan Romney, waarna die de koploper werd voor de nominatie van de Republikeinse Partij.
mt: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former Speaker of the United States House of Representatives Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. Florida uses the "winner takes all" system, and awarded all 50 delegates to Romney, making him the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Voormalig voorzitter van het Huis van Afgevaardigden Newt Gingrich, Texaans gouverneur Rick Perry en Congreslid Michele Bachmann eindigden achtereenvolgens op de vierde, vijfde en zesde plaats. Toen de resultaten bekend waren, prees Gingrich Santorum, maar uitte kritiek op Romney, namens wie in Iowa negatieve campagneadvertenties tegen Gingrich waren gepubliceerd. Perry verklaarde dat hij 'terug zou keren naar Texas om de resultaten van de stemming van vanavond te beoordelen, om zo te bepalen of er nog kans is voor mij in deze verkiezing,' maar zei later dat hij de verkiezingen zou afmaken en zou meedoen aan de voorverkiezing van 21 januari in South Carolina. De winnaar van de Ames Straw Poll in augustus, Bachmann, besloot haar campagne af te breken.
mt: Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished fourth, fifth and sixth respectively. When the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum, but criticized Romney, who had been the target of negative campaign ads in Iowa. Perry said he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's vote, to determine if there is still a chance for me in this election," but later said he would finish the election and participate in the January 21 South Carolina primary. The winner of the Ames Straw Poll in August, Bachmann, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: De website van het station beschrijft de show als 'old school hoorspel op de radio met een nieuwe en ongehoorde draai'! In het begin werd de show alleen uitgezonden via de langlopende radiowebsite TogiNet Radio, een website over praatprogramma's op de radio. Aan het eind van 2015 werd het onderstation AstroNet Radio opgericht. Aan de serie werkten oorspronkelijk lokale amateur-stemacteurs mee uit het oosten van Texas.
mt: The website describes the show as "old school radio drama with a new and unheard twist!" In the beginning, the show was only broadcast via the long-running radio website TogiNet Radio, a website about radio talk shows. At the end of 2015, the substation AstroNet Radio was founded. Originally, local amateur voice actors from the east of Texas worked on the series.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: De aanvallers in Mumbai kwamen op 26 november 2008 aan per boot, hadden granaten en automatische wapens bij zich en troffen meerdere doelwitten. Enkele getroffen doelwitten zijn het drukke treinstation Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus en het beroemde Taj Mahal Hotel. Dankzij het feit dat David Headly op verkenning ging en informatie verzamelde, konden de 10 schutters van de Pakistaanse militantengroep Laskhar-e-Taiba overgaan tot actie. De aanval heeft de relatie tussen India en Pakistan onder druk gezet.
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers in Mumbai came by boat, had grenades and automatic weapons and hit several targets. Some of the targets were the busy train station Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. Thanks to the fact that David Headly went on reconnaissance and collected information, the 10 shooters of the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba were able to act. The attack has put pressure on the relationship between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Het onderlinge record van Nadal tegen de Canadees is 7-2. Eerder leed hij een nederlaag tegen Raonic in de Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% van de netpunten in de wedstrijd, waardoor hij 76 punten behaalde in de eerste service. Na de wedstrijd zei De Gravelkoning, 'Ik ben gewoon blij dat ik weer in de laatste rondes van de belangrijkste wedstrijden sta. Ik ga dit proberen te winnen.'
mt: Nadal's record against Raonic is 7-2. Earlier, he lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of the net points in the match, earning him 76 points in the first service. After the match, the "King of Clay" said, "I'm just happy to be in the final rounds of the main tournaments again. I'm going to try to win this."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Vorige week heeft Naked News aangekondigd dat het de internationale berichtgeving drastisch gaat uitbreiden met drie nieuwe uitzendingen in verschillende talen. De wereldwijde organisatie doet al verslag in Engels en Japans, maar lanceert nu ook programma's in het Spaans, Italiaans en Koreaans voor op tv, internet en mobiele apparaten.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced it would be expanding its international coverage dramatically with three new broadcasts in different languages. The global organization has been reporting in English and Japanese, but is now launching programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, the Internet and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Naast het evenement van woensdag deed Carpanedo ook nog mee aan twee individuele races van het kampioenschap. Haar eerste was de Slalom, waar ze een Did Not Finish kreeg bij haar eerste run. 36 van de 116 deelnemers kregen hetzelfde resultaat in die race. In de andere wedstrijd waar ze aan deelnam, de zittende Grote Slalom, werd ze tiende van de dames, met een gecombineerde tijd van 4:41:30. Dat is 2:11:60 minuten langzamer dan de Oostenrijkse winnares Claudia Loesch, en 1:09:02 minuten langzamer dan de Hongaarse Gyöngyi Dani, die als negende eindigde. Vier skiërs van de vrouwengroep voor de zittende slalom konden hun ritten niet afmaken en het lukte 45 van de 117 skiërs in de reuzenslalom niet om zich te plaatsen tijdens de race.
mt: Carpanedo also competed in two individual races of the championship. Her first was the Slalom, where she got a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors got the same result in that race. In the other race where she competed, the sitting Giant Slalom, she finished tenth of the ladies, with a combined time of 4:41:30. That is 2:11:60 minutes slower than the Austrian winner Claudia Loesch, and 1:09:02 minutes slower than the Hungarian Gyöngyi Dani, who finished ninth. Four skiers of the women's group for the sitting slalom could not finish their runs and it succeeded 45 of the 117 skiers in the giant slalom not to place themselves during the race.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Als gevolg van COVID-19 werd door de National Basketball Association (NBA) van de Verenigde Staten afgelopen woensdag het professionele basketbalseizoen opgeschort. De beslissing van de NBA werd genomen nadat een speler van Utah Jazz positief testte voor het COVID-19-virus.
mt: As a result of COVID-19, the National Basketball Association (NBA) of the United States suspended its professional basketball season on Wednesday. The NBA's decision was made after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: De Speler van de Dag is Alex Ovechkin van de Washington Capitals. In de wedstrijd waarin Washington met 5-3 van de Atlanta Thrashers won, maakte hij 2 doelpunten en 2 assists. Ovechkins eerste assist van de avond was op het winnende doelpunt van debutant Nicklas Backstrom; Zijn tweede doelpunt van de avond was zijn 60ste van het seizoen. Hierdoor werd hij de eerste speler die sinds het seizoen van 1995-1996 zestig of meer doelpunten scoorde. In dat seizoen bereikten Jaromir Jagr en Mario Lemieux allebei die mijlpaal.
mt: The Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. In the game where Washington beat the Atlanta Thrashers 5-3, he scored two goals and two assists. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; His second goal of the night was his 60th of the season. This made him the first player since the 1995-1996 season to score 60 or more goals. In that season, Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux both reached that milestone.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: In navolging van de openbaarmaking dat de bank in 2008 noodhulp had gekregen van de Britse regering, is de Northern Rock-bank genationaliseerd. Northern Rock had steun nodig omdat de bank te maken kreeg met de risicovolle hypotheekcrisis in 2007. De Virgin Group van Sir Richard Branson deed een bod op de bank, maar dit werd afgewezen voordat de bank werd genationaliseerd. Tijdens de nationalisering splitste topbank Northern Rock plc zich in 2010 af van de 'slechte bank' Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin Group heeft niet de vermogensbeheerder gekocht, maar alleen de 'goede bank' Northern Rock.
mt: In the wake of the announcement that the bank had received government assistance in 2008, the Northern Rock bank was nationalized. Northern Rock had needed support because the bank was affected by the risky mortgage crisis in 2007. The Virgin Group of Sir Richard Branson made an offer for the bank, but this was rejected before the bank was nationalized. During the nationalization, top bank Northern Rock plc split off from the 'bad bank' Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin Group did not buy the asset manager, but only the 'good bank' Northern Rock.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Mr. Rudds besluit om het klimaatakkoord van Kyoto te ondertekenen, betekent dat de Verenigde Staten het enige ontwikkelde land is dat de overeenkomst niet heeft ondertekend. De vroegere conservatieve regering in Australië weigerde het Verdrag van Kyoto te ondertekenen, omdat het de economie schade zou toebrengen, vanwege de zware afhankelijkheid van de steenkoolexport, terwijl landen als China en India zich niet aan de emissiedoelstellingen hoefden te houden.
mt: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord means the United States is the only developed country that has not signed the treaty. The former conservative government in Australia refused to sign the Kyoto Protocol, saying it would damage the economy because of its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like China and India were not required to meet emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Mr. Rudds besluit om het klimaatakkoord van Kyoto te ondertekenen, betekent dat de Verenigde Staten het enige ontwikkelde land is dat de overeenkomst niet heeft ondertekend. De vroegere conservatieve regering in Australië weigerde het Verdrag van Kyoto te ondertekenen, omdat het de economie schade zou toebrengen, vanwege de zware afhankelijkheid van de steenkoolexport, terwijl landen als China en India zich niet aan de emissiedoelstellingen hoefden te houden.
mt: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord means the United States is the only developed country that has not signed the treaty. The former conservative government in Australia refused to sign the Kyoto Protocol, saying it would damage the economy because of its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like China and India were not required to meet emissions targets.

Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Schutters in de aanvullende proef voor ongediertebestrijding moesten nauwlettend in de gaten worden gehouden door boswachters. De proef werd namelijk gevolgd en de effectiviteit ervan werd beoordeeld. Bij een samenwerking tussen de NPWS en de Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, werden gekwalificeerde vrijwilligers gerekruteerd voor het jachtprogramma van de Sporting Shooters Association. Volgens Mick O'Flynn, waarnemend directeur voor parkbehoud en erfgoed bij de NPWS, hebben de vier gekozen schutters voor de eerste schietoperatie een uitgebreide veiligheids- en trainingsinstructie gehad.
mt: Shooters in the supplementary trial for pest control had to be closely monitored by park rangers. The trial was followed and its effectiveness was assessed. In a collaboration between the NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited for the hunting program of the Sporting Shooters Association. According to Mick O'Flynn, acting director for park conservation and heritage at the NPWS, the four selected shooters for the first shooting operation had a comprehensive safety and training instruction.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: Dit fossiel wijst erop dat de splitsing veel eerder heeft plaatsgevonden dan op basis van het moleculaire bewijs valt te verwachten. 'Dat betekent dat alles verder terug in de tijd worden geplaatst,' zei Berhane Asfaw, onderzoeker van de Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopië en medeauteur van het onderzoek.
mt: This fossil suggests that the split occurred much earlier than would be expected based on the molecular evidence. "That means everything is pushed back in time," said Berhane Asfaw, researcher with the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Donderdag onthulde Satoru Iwata, de directeur van Nintendo, tijdens de keynotepresentatie van de Tokyo Game Show het ontwerp van de controller voor de nieuwe Nintendo Revolution. Net als bij een tv-afstandsbediening maakt de controller gebruik van twee sensoren vlak bij de televisie van de gebruiken om de positie in een driedimensionale ruimte te kunnen bepalen. Hiermee besturen spelers acties en bewegingen in videogames door het apparaat door de lucht te bewegen.
mt: On Thursday, Satoru Iwata, the president of Nintendo, unveiled the controller design for the new Nintendo Revolution during the keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show. Like a TV remote, the controller uses two sensors near the television of the user to determine position in a three-dimensional space. This allows players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Het Chinese persbureau Xinhua meldde eerder nog dat een vliegtuig was gekaapt. Uit latere rapporten blijkt daarnaast dat er een bommelding werd gedaan in het vliegtuig, waardoor het werd teruggeleid naar Afghanistan en landde in Kandahar. Uit eerste berichten blijkt dat het vliegtuig terug is geleid naar Afghanistan, nadat het niet was toegestaan een noodlanding te maken in Ürümqi.
mt: Chinese state news agency Xinhua earlier reported that a plane was hijacked. Later reports also indicate that a bomb threat was made in the plane, causing it to be diverted to Afghanistan and land in Kandahar. Initial reports indicate that the plane was diverted to Afghanistan after it was not allowed to make an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: Op maandag kondigde Sara Danius, de permanente secretaris van de nobelcommissie voor literatuur bij de Zweedse Academie, tijdens een radioprogramma op Sveriges Radio in Zweden aan dat de commissie Bob Dylan niet direct kon bereiken om hem te vertellen dat hij de Nobelprijs voor literatuur van 2016 had gewonnen en geen moeite meer zou doen om hem te bereiken. Danius verklaarde, 'We doen momenteel niks. Ik heb met zijn naaste medewerker gebeld en gemailed en vriendelijke antwoorden gekregen. Op dit moment is dat genoeg.'
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee had been unable to reach Bob Dylan directly to inform him that he had won the 2016 Nobel Prize for Literature and would not be making any further attempts to reach him. Danius stated, "We're doing nothing at the moment. I've called and emailed his closest associate and received friendly replies. For now, that's enough."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: George W. Bush, de leider van de VS, juichte de bekendmaking toe. Een woordvoerder van Bush, Gordon Johndroe, beschreef de belofte van Noord-Korea 'een grote vooruitgang in ons doel om het Koreaanse schiereiland te denucleariseren.'
mt: George W. Bush, the leader of the US, cheered the announcement. A spokesman for Bush, Gordon Johndroe, described the promise of North Korea 'a big step forward in our goal to denuclearize the Korean peninsula.'
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: Słania verhuisde in 1956 naar Zweden, waar hij drie jaar later bij de Zweedse posterijen aan de slag ging en daar hoofdgraveur werd. Hij produceerde meer dan 1000 postzegels voor Zweden en nog 28 andere landen. Zijn werk wordt erkend om de kwaliteit en het detail en zijn naam is een begrip onder postzegelverzamelaars. Sommige verzamelaars richting zich enkel op het verzamelen van zijn werk. De prachtige postzegel 'Great Deeds by Swedish Kings', gemaakt door David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000 en die vermeld wordt in het Guinness Book of Records, was zijn 1.000ste postzegel. Voor veel landen bracht hij gravures aan in bankbiljetten. Recente voorbeelden van zijn werk zijn de portretten van de Minister-president op de voorkant van de nieuwe Canadese biljetten van 5 en 100 dollar.
mt: Słania moved to Sweden in 1956, where he became head engraver at the Swedish postal service three years later. He produced more than 1,000 postage stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is recognized for its quality and detail, and his name is a byword among stamp collectors. Some collectors focus solely on collecting his work. The beautiful stamp "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings", made by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000 and mentioned in the Guinness Book of Records, was his 1,000th stamp. For many countries he engraved portraits of the prime minister on the front of new Canadian bills of 5 and 100 dollars.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Ongeveer 800 mijl van de Trans-Alaska-pijpleiding is afgesloten nadat er duizenden vaten ruwe olie ten zuiden van Fairbanks in Alaska zijn gelekt. Een stroomstoring na een routinematige brandbeveiligingstest zorgde voor een overstroming van de openingen van de ontlastingskleppen en ruwe olie in de buurt van het Fort Greely-pompstation 9. Door de opening van de kleppen is het systeem onder druk komen te staan en kon de olie op een pad stromen naar een tank met een capaciteit van 55.000 vaten (2,3 miljoen gallon). Op woensdagmiddag was er nog steeds een lekage in de tankventilatoren. Dit kwam waarschijnlijk door de thermische uitzetting in de tank. Een tweede beperkingsgebied onder de tanks dat tot 104.500 vaten kan opslaan, was nog niet volledig gevuld.
mt: 800 miles south of the Trans-Alaska pipeline is closed after thousands of barrels of crude oil leaked near Fairbanks, Alaska. A power outage after a routine fire safety test caused a flooding of the relief valve openings and crude oil near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The opening of the valves put the system under pressure and allowed the oil to flow on a path to a tank with a capacity of 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). On Wednesday afternoon there was still a leak in the tank ventilators. This probably came from the thermal expansion in the tank. A second containment area under the tanks that can hold up to 104,500 barrels was not fully filled.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Volgens berekeningen van het U.S. Corps of Engineers kan 6 inches regen mogelijk de eerder beschadigde dijken doen doorbreken. In de Ninth Ward stond het water tijdens de orkaan Katrina op meer dan 20 voet hoogte. Nog steeds staat het water hier tot aan de middel, omdat de nabije dijk het water niet kon tegenhouden. Het water stroomt over een stuk van 100 voet breed over de dijk.
mt: 6 inches of rain could possibly break the levees that were damaged earlier, according to calculations by the U.S. Corps of Engineers. In the Ninth Ward, the water was over 20 feet high during Hurricane Katrina. The water is still up to the middle of the street, because the nearby levee could not hold it back. The water is flowing over a 100 foot wide section of the levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton bevestigde dat de patiënt is opgenomen in het Howard University Hospital en in stabiele toestand verkeert. De patiënt was naar Nigeria geweest, waar het ebolavirus al in kleine mate voorkwam. Het ziekenhuis volgde het protocol voor infectiebeheersing, waaronder het afzonderen van de patiënt om zo te voorkomen dat anderen geïnfecteerd raken.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that the patient was admitted to the Howard University Hospital and was in stable condition. The patient had traveled to Nigeria, where the Ebola virus had been present in small numbers. The hospital followed the infection control protocol, including isolating the patient to prevent others from becoming infected.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Kometen zouden een bron kunnen zijn geweest waardoor er water op aarde is gekomen, samen met organisch materiaal dat proteïnen vormt en het leven ondersteunt. Wetenschappers hopen inzicht te kunnen krijgen in de manier waarop planeten ontstaan. Ze willen vooral graag weten hoe de aarde is ontstaan, gezien het feit dat het al heel lang is geleden dat kometen met de aarde in botsing zijn gekomen.
mt: Comets may have been the source of water on Earth, along with organic material that forms proteins and supports life. Scientists hope to gain insight into how planets form. They especially want to know how Earth formed, since it has been a long time since comets have collided with Earth.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Hoewel de autoriteiten niet zeker weten of het een serieuze dreiging is, ging de transportautoriteit van Maryland op aandringen van de FBI over tot sluiting. Kiepwagens werden gebruikt om de tunnelingang te blokkeren en 80 politieagenten waren aanwezig om motorrijders de goede kant op te wijzen. De alternatieve route van de stad, de ringweg, was vrij van lange files.
mt: Although authorities are not sure if the threat is serious, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the tunnel at the request of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block the tunnel entrance and 80 police officers were on hand to direct motorcyclists to the alternate route, the beltway, which was free of long traffic jams.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Vervolgens werd de fotograaf overgebracht naar het Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, waar hij is overleden. Volgens bronnen was hij in de twintig. 'Ik was niet aanwezig of rechtstreeks betrokken bij dit ongelukkige voorval, maar ik houd de familie van het slachtoffer in mijn gedachten,' aldus een verklaring van Bieber. De entertainmentnieuwswebsite TMZ zegt dat de fotograaf zijn voertuig aan de andere kant van de Sepulveda Boulevard had geparkeerd en foto's probeerde te maken van de verkeerscontrole voordat hij de straat overstak en meer foto's maakte. Dit leidde ertoe dat de politieagent van de California Highway Patrol die de verkeerscontrole overzag hem tweemaal verzocht terug naar zijn auto te gaan. De bestuurder van het voertuig waardoor de fotograaf is geraakt, wordt volgens de politie waarschijnlijk niet strafrechtelijk vervolgd.
mt: The photographer was then taken to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he died. According to sources, he was in his twenties. "I was not present or directly involved in this unfortunate incident, but I am praying for the family of the victim," Bieber said in a statement. The entertainment news website TMZ reports that the photographer had parked his vehicle on the other side of the Sepulveda Boulevard and was taking pictures of the traffic control before he crossed the street and took more pictures. This led to the California Highway Patrol officer who was directing traffic asking him twice to return to his vehicle. The driver of the vehicle that struck the photographer is not expected to be criminally charged.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

De entertainmentnieuwswebsite TMZ zegt dat de fotograaf zijn voertuig aan de andere kant van de Sepulveda Boulevard had geparkeerd en foto's probeerde te maken van de verkeerscontrole voordat hij de straat overstak en meer foto's maakte. Dit leidde ertoe dat de politieagent van de California Highway Patrol die de verkeerscontrole overzag hem tweemaal verzocht terug naar zijn auto te gaan. De bestuurder van het voertuig waardoor de fotograaf is geraakt, wordt volgens de politie waarschijnlijk niet strafrechtelijk vervolgd.
mt: The photographer was then taken to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he died. According to sources, he was in his twenties. "I was not present or directly involved in this unfortunate incident, but I am praying for the family of the victim," Bieber said in a statement. The entertainment news website TMZ reports that the photographer had parked his vehicle on the other side of the Sepulveda Boulevard and was taking pictures of the traffic control before he crossed the street and took more pictures. This led to the California Highway Patrol officer who was directing traffic asking him twice to return to his vehicle. The driver of the vehicle that struck the photographer is not expected to be criminally charged.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: Arias testte positief voor een milde variant van het virus, gaf presidentieel minister Rodrigo Arias aan. De president is in stabiele toestand, al zal hij de komende dagen thuis in isolatie gaan. Behalve de koorts en zere keel voel ik me goed genoeg om mijn werkzaamheden te verrichten via telewerken. 'Ik verwacht op maandag weer al mijn taken te kunnen uitvoeren', zei Arias in een verklaring.
mt: Arias tested positive for a mild variant of the virus, presidential minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president is in stable condition, but will be in home isolation for the coming days. Besides the fever and sore throat, I feel well enough to perform my duties via teleworking. 'I expect to be able to perform all my tasks on Monday', Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: De tropische orkaan Gonu is vernoemd naar een zak met palmbladeren in de taal van de Malediven en bereikte op zijn hoogtepunt een aanhoudende wind van 240 kilometer per uur (149 mijl per uur). Eerder op de dag waren er windsnelheden van 83 km/u en er werd verwacht dat de windkracht zou blijven afnemen.
mt: The tropical cyclone Gonu was named after a sack of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives and reached its peak sustained winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). Earlier in the day, winds were 83 km/h and it was expected that the wind speed would continue to decrease.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Het rode getij wordt veroorzaakt door een grotere concentratie Karenia brevis dan normaal, een eencellig marien organisme dat hier natuurlijk voorkomt. Omdat natuurlijke factoren met elkaar kunnen interfereren, zorgen ze voor optimale omstandigheden, waardin het aantal algen drastisch kan toenemen. Het zenuwgif dat de alg produceert, is in staat de zenuwen bij zowel mensen als vissen uit te uitschakelen. Vissen sterven vaak vanwege de hoge concentratie giftige stoffen in het water. Mensen kunnen worden besmet door het inademen van water dat door de wind en golven in de lucht terechtkomt.
mt: The red tide is caused by a higher concentration of Karenia brevis than normal, a single-celled marine organism that naturally occurs here. Because natural factors can interfere with each other, they create optimal conditions in which the number of algae can dramatically increase. The neurotoxin that the algae produces is able to shut down the nerves of both humans and fish. Fish often die from the high concentration of toxic substances in the water. People can be infected by inhaling water that is blown into the air by the wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felicia begon als categorie 4-storm op de schaal van Saffir-Simpson, maar zwakte af tot een tropische depressie voor deze op dinsdag verdween. De restanten veroorzaakten op de meeste eilanden regenbuien, maar tot nu toe is er nog geen schade of overstroming gemeld. De regenval bereikte bij een meting op Oahu 6,34 inch en werd 'gunstig' genoemd. Een deel van de buien ging gepaard met onweersbuien en frequente bliksem.
mt: Felicia began as a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson scale, but weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating on Tuesday. The remnants caused rain showers on most islands, but no damage or flooding has been reported so far. The rainfall reached 6.34 inches on Oahu and was "favorable" according to a measurement. Some of the showers were accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. crashte in de Grand Prix van Singapore in 2008, net nadat Fernando Alonso al vroeg een pitstop maakte, waarbij de safety car de baan opkwam. Terwijl de wagens vóór Alonso onder de safety car gingen bijtanken, nam hij de koppositie in om de overwinning te pakken. Piquet jr. werd in 2009 ontslagen na de Grand Prix van Hongarije.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix crash, where Piquet Jr. crashed early in the race, just after Fernando Alonso made an early pit stop, with the safety car coming out. While the cars ahead of Alonso went under the safety car to refuel, he took the lead to win the race. Piquet Jr. was fired in 2009 after the Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Een onderzoek dat dinsdag in het wetenschappelijke tijdschrift Science werd gepubliceerd, ging over de vorming van een nieuwe vogelsoort op de Galapagoseilanden in Ecuador. Onderzoekers van de Princeton University in de Verenigde Staten en de Uppsala University in Zweden, rapporteerden dat nieuwe soorten zich binnen twee generaties evolueerden. Men dacht dat dit proces veel langer duurde doordat het kruizen van een inheemse darwinvink, de Middelste grondvink, met een geïmmigreerde Cactusgrondvink, de Españolagrondvink, langer duurde.
mt: A study published Tuesday in the scientific journal Science went over the formation of a new bird species on the Galapagos Islands in Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that new species evolved within two generations. It was thought that the process took much longer because the crossbreeding of a native Darwin's finch, the Medium Ground Finch, with an immigrant Cactus Finch, the Española Ground Finch, took longer.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Het artistieke evenement is ook een onderdeel van een campagne die wordt gevoerd door het stadhuis van Boekarest. Het doel is om het imago van de Roemeense hoofdstad nieuw leven in te blazen als creatieve en kleurrijke metropool. De stad zal de eerste in het zuidoosten van Europa zijn waar de CowParade wordt gehouden: 's werelds grootste openbare kunstevenement tussen juni en augustus van dit jaar.
mt: The artistic event is also part of a campaign being conducted by the city hall of Bucharest. The goal is to revitalize the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colorful metropolis. Bucharest will be the first city in Southeast Europe to host the CowParade: the world's largest public art event between June and August of this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Het luchtvaarttuig werd bestuurd door binnenlandse troepen en was op weg naar Irkoetsk. Er wordt een onderzoek ingesteld. Sinds ongeveer 1970 is de Il-76 één van de belangrijkste onderdelen van eerst het Sovjetleger en nu ook het Russische leger, dit heeft vorige maand al tot een zwaar ongeval op Russisch gebied geleid. Op 7 oktober liet de motor tijdens het opstijgen los. Er vielen geen gewonden. Rusland hield de Il-76s na dat ongeluk korte tijd aan de grond.
mt: The aircraft was being flown by the Russian Air Force and was en route to Irkutsk. An investigation is underway. Since about 1970, the Il-76 has been one of the main components of the Soviet and now Russian Air Force, this has led to a serious accident on Russian soil last month. On October 7, the engine failed during takeoff. There were no injuries. Russia grounded the Il-76s after that accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Vóór The Simpsons werkte Simon in verschillende functies aan een aantal series. Hij verleende in de jaren 80 zijn medewerking aan shows zoals Taxi, Cheers en The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 werkte hij samen met Brooks en Groening aan The Simpsons en was hij verantwoordelijk voor het werven van het eerste schrijversteam. Na zijn vertrek uit de serie in 1993, bleef hij op papier uitvoerend producent, waardoor hij voor elke reeks royalty's ontving, ter waarde van enkele tientallen miljoenen dollars.
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon worked in various capacities on a number of series. In the 1980s, he provided his assistance to shows such as Taxi, Cheers and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989, he worked with Brooks and Groening on The Simpsons and was responsible for recruiting the first writing staff. After leaving the series in 1993, he remained on paper as executive producer, allowing him to receive royalties for each season, worth several tens of millions of dollars.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke schreef het volgende: sommige mensen probeerden vrouwen tegen te houden om zich uit te spreken over de gezondheid van vrouwen, maar deze pogingen hadden geen succes. Dit baseerde ze op de vele positieve opmerkingen en steunbetuigingen van zowel mannen als vrouwen die vonden dat anticonceptie als een medische noodzaak moet worden beschouwd.
mt: Fluke wrote that some people tried to prevent women from speaking about women's health, but these efforts were unsuccessful. This was based on the many positive comments and expressions of support from both men and women who felt that contraception should be considered a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: Het vertoont hetzelfde gedrag als water. Het is transparant net zoals water transparant is. Als u dus aan de kustlijn zou staan, kunt u zien welke kiezelstenen of smurrie er op de bodem lagen. 'Voor zover bekend is er maar één planetair lichaam dat dynamischer is dan Titan en de naam is Aarde', voegde Stofan toe.
mt: It behaves the same way as water. It is transparent just like water is transparent. If you were standing on the shoreline, you could see what pebbles or mud were on the bottom. 'To the best of our knowledge, there is only one planetary body that is more dynamic than Titan and the name is Earth,' Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Dit bewijst niet alleen de al wijdverspreide theorie dat in elk geval bepaalde dinosauriërs veren hadden, maar biedt ook meer details dan fossielen, zoals de kleur en driedimensionale plaatsing. . Volgens wetenschappers was het verenkleed van dit dier kastanjebruin met een bleke of carotenoïdekleurige onderzijde. De vondst geeft ook inzicht in de evolutie van veren bij vogels. De onderzoekers trokken de conclusie dat de rachis waarschijnlijk een latere evolutionaire ontwikkeling was, doordat dinosaurusveren geen goed ontwikkelde schacht, oftewel een rachis, hebben, maar wel over andere kenmerken van veren beschikken - zoals weerhaken. De structuur van de veren lijkt erop te wijzen dat deze niet gebruikt werden om te vliegen, maar om de temperatuur te regelen of om hoe het eruit zag. De onderzoekers suggereerden dat dit de staart van een jonge dinosaurus is, maar dat dit monster juist volwassen veren laat zien en dus niet het dons van een kuiken. De onderzoekers suggereerden dat, ondanks dat het om de staart van een jonge dinosaurus gaat, het monster het verenkleed van een volwassene had en niet het dons van een kuiken.
mt: This not only proves the widely held theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provides more details than fossils, such as color and three-dimensional placement. According to scientists, the plumage of this animal was chestnut brown with a pale or carotenoid underside. The discovery also provides insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. The researchers concluded that the rachis was probably a later evolutionary development, because dinosaur feathers lacked a well-developed shaft, or rachis, but did have other characteristics of feathers - such as barbs. The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation or appearance. The researchers suggested that this is the tail of a young dinosaur, but that this monster shows adult feathers and not the down of a chick. The researchers suggested that, despite the fact that it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the monster had the plumage of an adult and not the down of a chick.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

Volgens wetenschappers was het verenkleed van dit dier kastanjebruin met een bleke of carotenoïdekleurige onderzijde. De vondst geeft ook inzicht in de evolutie van veren bij vogels. De onderzoekers trokken de conclusie dat de rachis waarschijnlijk een latere evolutionaire ontwikkeling was, doordat dinosaurusveren geen goed ontwikkelde schacht, oftewel een rachis, hebben, maar wel over andere kenmerken van veren beschikken - zoals weerhaken. De structuur van de veren lijkt erop te wijzen dat deze niet gebruikt werden om te vliegen, maar om de temperatuur te regelen of om hoe het eruit zag. De onderzoekers suggereerden dat dit de staart van een jonge dinosaurus is, maar dat dit monster juist volwassen veren laat zien en dus niet het dons van een kuiken. De onderzoekers suggereerden dat, ondanks dat het om de staart van een jonge dinosaurus gaat, het monster het verenkleed van een volwassene had en niet het dons van een kuiken.
mt: This not only proves the widely held theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provides more details than fossils, such as color and three-dimensional placement. According to scientists, the plumage of this animal was chestnut brown with a pale or carotenoid underside. The discovery also provides insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. The researchers concluded that the rachis was probably a later evolutionary development, because dinosaur feathers lacked a well-developed shaft, or rachis, but did have other characteristics of feathers - such as barbs. The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation or appearance. The researchers suggested that this is the tail of a young dinosaur, but that this monster shows adult feathers and not the down of a chick. The researchers suggested that, despite the fact that it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the monster had the plumage of an adult and not the down of a chick.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. src: Eén experimenteel vaccin lijkt in staat te zijn de ebola-sterfte terug te dringen, maar tot nu toe zijn nog geen medicijnen duidelijk geschikt voor de behandeling van bestaande infecties. Een cocktail van antilichamen, ZMapp, was aanvankelijk veelbelovend in het veld. Officiële onderzoeken toonden echter aan dat het minder voordelen had dan gewenst bij het voorkomen dat mensen overlijden. ZMapp was een controle in de PALM-proef, dus gebruikten wetenschappers het als baseline en vergeleken de drie andere behandelmethoden hiermee.
mt: One experimental vaccine appears to be able to reduce Ebola mortality, but so far no drugs have been clearly suitable for treating existing infections. A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, was initially promising in the field. Official studies, however, showed that it had less benefits than desired in preventing people from dying. ZMapp was a control in the PALM trial, so researchers used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatment methods to it.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Op maandag kondigden wetenschappers van de Stanford University School of Medicine aan dat een nieuw diagnostisch hulpmiddel is uitgevonden dat cellen op type kan ordenen: een piepkleine af te drukken chip die voor waarschijnlijk ongeveer één dollarcent per stuk kan worden geproduceerd met behulp van standaard inkjetprinters. Hoofdonderzoekers zeggen dat dit kan leiden tot een vroege opsporing van kanker, tuberculose, HIV en malaria bij patiënten in arme landen. Hier zijn de overlevingskansen bij een aandoening als borstkanker de helft minder dan in rijke landen.
mt: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced that a new diagnostic tool has been developed that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be produced for about one dollar per unit using standard inkjet printers. Lead researchers say this could lead to early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in patients in poor countries. Here are survival rates for a condition like breast cancer half that of rich countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Wetenschappers hebben deze aardvormen of lobvormige glooiingen ontdekt die over het oppervlak van de maan zijn verspreid en het gevolg lijken te zijn van het zeer langzaam kleiner worden van de maan. Deze glooiingen werden overal op het maanoppervlak gevonden en ogen minimaal verweerd, wat erop wijst dat ze relatief recent door geologische processen zijn veroorzaakt. Deze theorie is in strijd met de bewering dat er geen enkele geologische activiteit is op de maan.
mt: Scientists have discovered these lunar "horns" or "lobate" bulges that are spread across the surface of the moon and appear to be the result of the moon's very slow shrinking. These bulges were found everywhere on the lunar surface and appear minimally eroded, suggesting that they were recently caused by geological processes. This theory is in conflict with the claim that there is no geological activity on the moon.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Adekoya is sindsdien in de Edinburgh Sheriff Court veroordeeld voor het vermoorden van haar zoon. Ze zit in hechtenis in afwachting van de aanklacht en het proces, maar het ooggetuigenverslag is mogelijk bedoezeld omdat haar verhaal veelvuldig is gepubliceerd. Dit is gangbare praktijk in de rest van het VK, maar justitie in Schotland werkt anders en rechtbanken hebben de publicatie van foto's als mogelijk nadelig bestempeld. Professor Pamela Ferguson van de Universiteit van Dundee merkt op dat 'journalisten een gevaarlijk spelletje spelen als ze foto's e.d. van verdachten publiceren.' Crown Office heeft de algehele leiding over vervolgingen en heeft aan journalisten aangegeven dat er geen verdere uitspraken worden gedaan, in ieder geval totdat aanklachten zijn gedaan.
mt: Adekoya has since been convicted of murdering her son in the Edinburgh Sheriff Court. She is in custody awaiting charges and trial, but the witness statement may be biased because her story has been widely published. This is common practice in the rest of the UK, but justice in Scotland works differently and courts have deemed the publication of photos etc. as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes that "journalists are playing a dangerous game when they publish photos etc. of suspects." Crown Office has overall control of prosecutions and has informed journalists that no further statements will be made, at least until charges are filed.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Naast het brekende ijs, hebben ook extreme weersomstandigheden reddingsacties belemmerd. Pittman verklaarde dat de condities niet voor volgende week zouden verbeteren. Volgens Pittman is de hoeveelheid en de dikte van het pakijs nog nooit zo slecht geweest voor zeehondenjagers in de laatste vijftien jaar.
mt: In addition to the breaking ice, extreme weather conditions have hampered rescue efforts. Pittman said the conditions would not improve for the next week. According to Pittman, the amount and thickness of the pack ice has never been so bad for seal hunters in the last fifteen years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
